short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension who clicks on every twitch loot and gets you reports about it

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It's simple, whenever a twitch lootbox is avaliable this extension will click it for you.
